MefExternalAddressIdentifier.description:
A unique identifier controlled by a generally accepted independent administrative authority that specifies a fixed geographical location. 
Reference: MEF 79 (Sn 8.9.4)

externalReferenceId.description: A reference to an address by id

externalReferenceType.description: The type of the reference. For North American providers this would normally be CLLI (Common Language Location Identifier) code
